channel.title: Error loading block database
channel.description:
My system has the following specifications
QT Wallet, Client Wallet (and version) or Web wallet: BitBay PC QT Wallet version 3.0.1 64 bit Operating System and version: Windows 10 If web wallet browser name and version: If desktop wallet (Qt or Client) block # of your client and # of connections: 770000
The problem I am having is - I downloaded the QT wallet, opened it and start synchronization. Then wallet was closed. Every time, after trying to open the wallet, it start loading block index and stoped at 770000 and the next error window was shown: ![%D0%91%D0%B5%D0%B7%D1%8B%D0%BC%D1%8F%D0%BD%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9|273x169](upload://kjHyTqK2HbwQoiKqqjS4WSxGbEb.png) So, I can't even open my wallet.

item.title: Error loading block database
item.dc:creator: @tradersnow
item.description:
@tradersnow wrote:

Hi @monix ,

The chain-split issue has been fixed, and an update is required for your QT wallet to function properly.

Please follow these instructions to complete the update process:

How to fix the chain split issue on Qt wallet (**MANDATORY FOR QT WALLET USERS**) Support
Please complete the following steps to download and install the new bootstrap and QT wallet. It is necessary to follow the steps in the correct order. Back up your “wallet.dat” and “BitBay” folder before moving to step two. Depending on your operating system, the BitBay data folder can be found in these locations: Windows users: users/“yourusername”/appdata/roaming/Bitbay folder (make sure you have “show hidden files” selected) Mac users: ~/Library > Application Support > BitBay Linux…

Once this update is complete, you should be able to sync 100% without issue.

If you have any questions, let us know.

Read full topic

item.title: Error loading block database
item.dc:creator: @monix Valentine
item.description:
@monix wrote:

Thank you for the information.

Read full topic

item.title: Error loading block database
item.dc:creator: @Craig_Claussen
item.description:
@Craig_Claussen wrote:

Sorry for the incovenience. We are busy fixing a split chain bug. The release should be out in the next few hours.

Your coins are safe. Instructions will be released ASAP.

To get more up to date with the fix, feel free to join our discord channel

Discord

Join the BitBay ($BAY) - Decentralised Market with Unbreakable Smart Contracts...

Check out the BitBay ($BAY) - Decentralised Market with Unbreakable Smart Contracts community on Discord - hang out with 267 other members and enjoy free voice and text chat.

Otherwise I will return in a couple of hours and update you with the new version of wallet

Thank you for your patience while we sort out this split chain bug

Read full topic
